version_description:
Improvements
• It's now possible to sort cards by newly released!
• Added a scroll bar to the card archive and combo grid.
• General optimizations around memory usage.

Fixes
• The research island should now correctly show a notification when a research tube is ready to be collected.
• Combo mastery crowns now show up correctly on Power Cards.

Improvements
• It's now possible to see the pool of cards in store bundles by tapping on the Legendary card icon.
• Additional filter options have been added to the Card Archive and Combo Grid.
• Added the Deck Swap button to the Research island.
• Improved the speed art is loaded.
• Ads should now load more consistently.
• General optimizations around memory usage.

Fixes
• Combo mastery crowns now show up correctly on Power Cards.
• Fixed an issue with cards sometimes displaying the wrong art.

Improvements
• Improved the research ad speedup flow
• Added a search filter UI to the combo grid to display currentled used filters

Fixes
• Fixed an issue causing the game to freeze in the deck screen
• Combo Mastery Crowns now correctly appear in the card inventory
• Various other bug fixes

New Features
• New filter in the Card Archive, Mastery Research, and Deck screens to filter cards and combos in upcoming and active Clash events!

Improvements
• Players will now receive notifications when Combo Mastery research is completed!

Fixes
• Fixed an issue where the screen on mobile devices could rotate while viewing ads.
• Fixed the icon for the Super Epic Pack.

New Features
• New filter in the Card Archive, Mastery Research, and Deck screens to filter cards and combos in upcoming and active Clash events!

Improvements
• Players will now receive notifications when Combo Mastery research is completed!

New Features
• We've added a Next Battle button to the Guild Rumble feature, allowing players to jump right into the action!

Improvements
• The cards in upcoming Clash battleground effects are now shown in the Archive and Research screens.

Fixes
• Various bug fixes.

Improvements
• UI updated to have better touch feedback

Fixes
• Various bug fixes

• Fixed scrolling in the combo list
• Various bug fixes
